body_html: I can't reproduce with your script, and it also seems highly unlikely that PyTorch master's convolution is this broken. A more likely explanation is that you have a header/library mismatch for cudnn. What happens if you conda remove cudnn from your environment and build again?
body_text: I can't reproduce with your script, and it also seems highly unlikely that PyTorch master's convolution is this broken. A more likely explanation is that you have a header/library mismatch for cudnn. What happens if you conda remove cudnn from your environment and build again?
body: I can't reproduce with your script, and it also seems highly unlikely that PyTorch master's convolution is this broken. A more likely explanation is that you have a header/library mismatch for cudnn. What happens if you `conda remove cudnn` from your environment and build again?
